sidebar.proBadgeDescription: All tools run locally in your browser. No data sent to servers.

dashboard.heroSubtitle: Your all-in-one toolkit for JSON manipulation, transformation, and translation file synchronization.
dashboard.quickStart1Desc: Paste your source (reference) locale file and target locale file. Click Sync to add missing keys and reorder.
dashboard.quickStart2Desc: Paste any JSON and choose from operations like minify, beautify, flatten, or convert to TypeScript.
dashboard.quickStart3Desc: Compare two JSON files side by side with visual highlighting of differences.

i18nSync.title: i18n Sync
i18nSync.description: Synchronize translation files by comparing source and target
i18nSync.howItWorks1: Keys in source but missing in target will be added with source values
i18nSync.howItWorks3: Key order follows the source structure
i18nSync.howItWorks4: Enable "Remove extra keys" to delete keys not in source
i18nSync.syncFailed: Sync failed. Please check your JSON.

transform.title: JSON Transform
transform.xmlInputPlaceholder:
Paste your XML here...

Example:
<root>
  <name>John</name>
  <address>
    <city>New York</city>
  </address>
</root>
transform.guideBeautifyMinifyDesc: Format or compress JSON with/without whitespace
transform.guideFlattenUnflattenDesc: Convert between nested and dot-notation structure
transform.guideXmlConversionDesc: Convert between JSON and XML formats seamlessly

diffViewer.title: JSON Diff Viewer
diffViewer.description: Compare two JSON files and visualize differences

keyCompare.title: Key Compare & Deep Audit
keyCompare.description: Find missing keys, untranslated values, and placeholder mismatches
keyCompare.noIssues: No issues found! Your translation files are in sync.

i18nSync.title: i18n Sync
i18nSync.description: Synchronize translation files instantly. Detect missing keys, merge updates, and keep all language files consistent.

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Transform JSON with various operations: minify, beautify, flatten, unflatten, sort keys, and convert to TypeScript interfaces.

diffViewer.title: Diff Viewer
diffViewer.description: Compare two JSON files visually. See additions, deletions, and changes highlighted with color-coded diff view.

keyCompare.title: Key Compare
keyCompare.description: Deep audit i18n files: find missing keys, untranslated values, and placeholder mismatches.

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.description: All processing happens in your browser - no data sent to servers.

i18n.title: i18n Ready
i18n.description: Purpose-built for managing translation and localization files.

devFriendly.title: Developer Friendly
devFriendly.description: Built by developers, for developers. Clean UI with keyboard shortcuts.
